forecast.day_comments: Snow showers likely.  Areas of blowing snow. Partly sunny, with a steady temperature around 16. Northwest wind around 8 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 70%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow showers likely before 7pm.  Areas of blowing snow before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around -6. Northwest wind 6 to 11 mph becoming light  after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 28 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
